Items.Title: A Local Law in relation to a study and report on the provision of agency services to older adults with certain neurological and mental health conditions

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, S.3563/A.2367, to expand eligibility for the Disability Rent Increase Exemption program to additional qualifying household members.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Expand eligibility for the Disability Rent Increase Exemption program to additional qualifying household members (S.3563/A.2367).

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the United States Congress and the President to take steps to protect social security
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Calling on the United States Congress and the President to take steps to protect social security.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to introduce and pass, and the Governor to sign, legislation to increase funding for Assertive Community Treatment teams.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Increase funding for Assertive Community Treatment teams.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Krishnan, Hudson, Schulman, Banks, Zhuang and Salaam
